name: Z Fighters Revolution
description:
Z-Fighters Revolution brings you a new animated idle RPG game with authentically designed anime characters for your battles! Just spend a little bit of time to develop and you can become a powerful player in this casual idle RPG game!

Summon Heroes, challenge instances, fight PvP in the arena, choose your favorite Heroes and start winning battles! Let's begin an epic adventure trip in this universe!


Game Features

Idle Battle Gameplay
This idle design of the battle mode let's you fight automatically anytime and anywhere. You can build a team with powerful Heroes while you're offline!

Even if you are offline your Heroes will still keep fighting and gain EXP and game items for you!

Heroes Collection
There are over 100 Heroes available to collect in this game! Upgrade your mighty heroes and dominate the universe!

Exclusive Costumes
Dress your heroes in your favorite costumes!
Customized outfits make your heroes unique and outstanding!

Build A Powerful Team
Summon Heroes and build your team strategically to defeat the Bosses!
Deploy Heroes in different formations for the best tactics to win the battles!
